t: Why we invested in A Dozen Cousins

t: Our Story – A Dozen Cousins
s: As I got older and learned the importance of eating naturally, I hated that it was so hard to find convenient foods that were both healthy and authentic. I started A Dozen Cousins so that it would be easier to enjoy authentic cultural recipes made with wholesome ingredients. P.S. The brand name ...
